attributes.action: Replace soldier pay cut with an mp pay cut
attributes.additional_details: 1, Is it morally right to ask our soldiers to take a pay cut? Yes or No? 2, What would the required pay cut be (per MP) to maintain a soldiers current pay?...With price increases throughout society, a soldiers pay cut would still be equal to a reduction in pay..... This petition has been setup to raise the issue ....Are MP's willing to take a pay cut in order to maintain a soldiers wage, this therefore giving the respect our UK soldiers deserve.
